reviewText: Received item quickly.  Found this is a very good instruction video.  A lot of different ideas for the beginner and I enjoy being able to watch it over/over if I need.  I will purchase more of these in the series in the future.

The "Drawing Secrets Revealed" DVD is a very interesting and helpful to beginners especially but to the more advanced art student as well. I received it in good time and condition and for a good price - This is a reliable seller - Thank You
